summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2755 for the improvement of Leary Avenue, from Third Avenue Northwest to Sixth Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers and reconstructing the existing sewers where necessary, by constructing a connection with the North Trunk Sewer, under Ordinance No. 32913, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
